caption.title: CDFs of inverse persistence (θ) and local dimension ( d) for EM synoptic systems.
caption.p:
The NCEP/NCAR reanalysis 1948–2017 θ ( A) and d ( B) CDFs for the different synoptic systems: Red Sea Troughs (RSTs), Persian Troughs (PTs), Highs (H), Cyprus Lows (CLs), and Sharav Lows (SLs). CDFs for θ ( C) and d ( D) of deep and shallow CLs as defined by Alpert et al. (
7 ). Arrows indicate the snow events in Jerusalem for the available TIGGE data (
27 ,
28 ). The 12 December 2013 storm named Alexa with values of d = 13.71 and θ = 0.71 is also shown.
